title: Kirsty Gallacher goes grocery shopping in £60,000 electric Jaguar
text:
She's a doting mother to her children Oscar, 12, and Jude, nine.

And Kirsty Gallacher has snapped up her perfect 'mom-mobile' in the way of a brand new £60,000 Electric Jaguar I-Pace in white, as she was seen climbing into the vehicle after buying groceries in Surrey, on Saturday.

The TV presenter, 42, showcased her autumnal style in a knitted midi dress boasting slim red stripes upon a navy background, during her quick stop-off.

Fashionista: Kirsty Gallacher, 42, showcased her autumnal style in a knitted midi dress as she debuted her new car during a grocery run on Saturday

Kirsty nailed casual chic in her eye-catching frock, which she teamed with a pair of white trainers.

With a large black tote bag slung over her shoulder, the television personality carried a packet of lettuce in her arm.

Her short raven locks were parted in the centre and pulled into a stunted ponytail at the nape of her neck, while she sported a dark smokey eye.

Kirsty's brand new car is an all-electric Jaguar I-Pace EV400 AWD, which retails with a start price of around £60,000.

New wheels: The TV presenter has snapped up her perfect 'mom-mobile' in the way of a brand new £60,000 Electric Jaguar I-Pace in white

The essentials: With a large black tote bag slung over her shoulder, the television personality carried a packet of lettuce in her arm.

Keeping it casual: Kirsty nailed casual chic in her eye-catching frock, which she teamed with a pair of white trainers

Earlier this year, Kirsty discussed her painful marital split, dating again and seeking advice from her brother-in-law Russell Brand, 44, as she spoke to Lisa Snowdon on new Fabulous podcast Things I Told My Daughter.

The star was interviewed alongside her mother Lesley and revealed Russell helped guide her through 'grief, trauma and abandonment issues' in the wake of her divorce by offering some sage advice.

Kirsty and former rugby player Paul Sampson, 42, parted ways in 2015 after five years of marriage and continue to raise their two children.

She said: 'It's very upsetting, I feel like I was blaming myself for everything. I'm sure Paul was doing the same. Because you have children in your care. It's a horrible, horrible burden.'

Brand new: Kirsty's brand new car is an all-electric Jaguar I-Pace EV400 AWD, which retails with a start price of around £60,000

Taking it for a spin: The TV star took her new wheels for a spin on Saturday

'The last three years have been very tough': Kirsty recently opened up about her divorce and struggling to date again on Lisa Snowdon's podcast (pictured in June 2019)

She added: 'The last three years have been very tough but it is for anybody getting divorced.

'Because you go through not only grief, but trauma, almost separation anxiety and abandonment issues in a way. I have talked about before the fact that you come out of it and you feel like you need to be with someone else.'

Since splitting from her husband, Kirsty has been linked to comedian Jack Whitehall, 31, and rugby player Danny Cipriani, 31.
description: The TV presenter, 42, was seen climbing into the vehicle after buying groceries in Surrey, on Saturday.
